WorkItem.Description: When I set InnerHtml property of a html node, it swallows the white-spaces. For example, if I want to change InnerHtml of a Html Text Node like that: "This text will be highlighted" with this html code: "This text will be highlighted" it produces the result as: "This text will behighlighted" It removes the white spaces before and after the span tag. Please see this post for detail: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7896297/preserve-white-space-with-htmlagilitypack
WorkItem.Summary: Setting to HtmlNode.InnerHtml doesn't preserve white-spaces
